title: Naturopathic Medical Schools
author: GSadmin
description: Naturopathic Medical Schools The following institutions have been accredited by the Council on Naturopathic Medical Education (CNME) and have been recognized as providing naturopathic medical education that meets the College's entry-to-practice requirements for the purposes of applying for registration. Bastyr University (Washington State campus)14500 Juanita Dr NEKenmore, Washington, 98028Phone: (425) 823-1300 Bastyr University (California campus)4106 Sorrento Valley BoulevardSan Diego, California 92121Phone: [...]
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Medical Schools The following institutions have been accredited by the [Council on Naturopathic Medical Education (CNME)](https://cnme.org/) and have been recognized as providing naturopathic medical education that meets the College's entry-to-practice requirements for the purposes of applying for registration. [Bastyr University](https://bastyr.edu/) (Washington State campus) 14500 Juanita University](https://bastyr.edu/) (California California 92121 Phone: 425-823-1300 [Canadian College of Naturopathic Medicine - Boucher](https://ccnm.edu/) * 330-435 Columbia Street New Westminster, British Columbia, V3L 5N8 Phone: (604) 777-9981 Formerly Boucher Institute of Naturopathic [Canadian College of Naturopathic Medicine - Toronto](https://ccnm.edu/) 1255 Sheppard North York, Ontario, (416) 498-1255 [National University of Natural Street Portland, Oregon, 97201 Phone: (503) 552-1660 [National University of Health Sciences](https://www.nuhs.edu/) Road Lombard, Illinois, 60148 Phone: (800) 826-6285 [Sonoran University of Health Sciences](https://www.sonoran.edu/) Street 85282
